reviews.review: ja foi um ótimo game, hoje encontra-se poluído por cheaters...

The game itself is great but the players of the game is the part that makes me love and hate this game. There is to many cheaters and valve doesnt give a shit about that. And if you actually want to play the game you have to go to a 3rd party site like faceit. But when you go to play faceit people are tryharding so fucking hard even down in lvl 2. So you can't just casully play the game with your friends just wanting to play a regular mm game without meeting cheaters or playing against people that play like it's a major final
